jobDescription: A 19-year old software engineer who loves to code
aboutText: I'm Aarnav Sanghvi, a 19-year old software engineer. I am passionate about coding and have developed a strong background in software engineering and development through my studies and experience. As a software developer, I have experience using ReactJS and C++ to create effective software solutions. My hobbies, such as hiking and biking, have also helped me to develop a keen eye for detail and an ability to think on my feet. I am confident that I can use my technical skills and unique perspectives to help develop innovative solutions and create meaningful products.
